backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all core types (Language, Message, VideoRequest, CoinPurchasePlan, TransactionRecord, etc.) and backend logic including Stripe integration, HTTP outcalls, and access control for the Shake AI platform.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three implemented features—CoinPurchaseDialog Stripe integration, live-mode Stripe env config, and per-user coin transaction history—to their associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing short summaries of each frontend source file, describing the purpose and key details of components, hooks, pages, and utilities in the Shake AI frontend.
frontend/.env: Frontend environment file defining VITE_STRIPE_PUBLISHABLE_KEY (placeholder for a live-mode Stripe key) and an optional VITE_GROQ_API_KEY for AI chat integration.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file documenting that only live-mode Stripe publishable keys (pk_live_) should be used, with instructions for obtaining them, plus a placeholder for the Groq API key.
frontend/index.css: Root CSS file defining Tailwind base/component/utility layers and OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including sidebar, chart, and destructive colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Shake AI PWA, setting the page title, meta/OG/Twitter tags, manifest link, PWA meta tags, and registering a service worker on load.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for Shake AI specifying app name, display mode, theme/background colors, orientation, and two icon sizes (192x192 and 512x512).
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy for static assets and network-first for API/canister calls, with install-time pre-caching and activation-time old cache cleanup.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up React Query with a memoized QueryClient, wraps the app in InternetIdentityProvider, and renders AppContent, Toaster, and PwaInstallBanner.
frontend/src/components/AppContent.tsx: Root app component that gates rendering based on authentication state, showing a loading spinner, error alert, login screen, or the authenticated layout depending on identity status.
frontend/src/components/AuthenticatedLay: Main layout for authenticated users, providing a sidebar/header navigation, coin balance display, logout, and routing to all feature screens via hash-based navigation.
frontend/src/components/CoinGate.tsx: Wrapper component that checks the user's coin balance and conditionally renders an insufficient-coins alert with a buy button instead of its children when balance is too low.
frontend/src/components/CoinPurchaseDial: Modal dialog that displays available coin purchase plans fetched from the backend and initiates a Stripe checkout session when the user selects and confirms a plan.
frontend/src/components/LinkShare.tsx: Popover component that lets users share the current page URL via clipboard copy, WhatsApp, Facebook, or Twitter/X.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallBanner: Fixed bottom banner that prompts the user to install the app as a PWA, shown only when a deferred install prompt is available and the app is not already running standalone.
frontend/src/components/TransactionHisto: Card panel that fetches and displays a scrollable list of the user's coin transactions, showing icons, badges, amounts, and timestamps for credits and debits.
frontend/src/constants/coins.ts: Defines numeric constants for coin action costs, low-balance threshold, and user-facing insufficient/low-balance message strings.
frontend/src/constants/languages.ts: Exports a constant array of 60+ language options (value/label pairs) for use in language selector dropdowns throughout the app.
frontend/src/hooks/coinQueryKeys.ts: Defines and exports centralized React Query cache keys for coin balance, purchase plans, and transaction history queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAddCoins.ts: Custom hook exposing a mutation to add coins to a target principal via the backend actor's adminAddCoins method.
frontend/src/hooks/useAIImageGenerator.t: Custom hook that handles AI image generation by checking coin balance, charging coins via the backend actor, and calling an external image generation API (Stability AI/Replicate/Hugging Face).
frontend/src/hooks/useAIVideoMaker.ts: Custom hook providing script and storyboard generation for AI video creation by calling the backend actor with structured VideoRequest payloads built from form data.
frontend/src/hooks/useChat.ts: Custom hook managing multi-turn chat state, sending messages to the Groq API with conversation history, handling image attachments, and deducting coins via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCoinBalance.ts: Custom hook that fetches and returns the current user's coin balance from the backend actor using React Query.
Custom hook that fetches available coin purchase plans from the backend actor, caching results for 5 minutes.
frontend/src/hooks/useColdEmailGenerator: Custom hook that calls the backend actor to generate cold emails, handling insufficient coin errors and invalidating coin-related query caches on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateStripeChecko: Custom hook exposing a mutation that creates a Stripe checkout session via the backend actor for a given coin purchase plan, returning the session ID and redirect URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useHashRoute.ts: Custom hook that manages client-side hash-based routing, parsing the URL hash into a typed view name and providing a navigate function to change views.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: React Query hook that checks whether the currently authenticated caller has admin privileges by calling the backend actor's `isCallerAdmin` method.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and saving the current user's profile via the backend actor, with cache invalidation on save.
frontend/src/hooks/usePurchaseCoins.ts: Mutation hook that calls the backend `purchaseCoins` method with a plan ID and invalidates coin balance and transaction history queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/usePurchaseCoinsWithS: Mutation hook that credits coins after a Stripe payment by calling `purchaseCoinsWithStripe` with a session ID and plan ID, then invalidates all coin-related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Hook that captures the browser's `beforeinstallprompt` event to enable programmatic PWA installation prompts and detects standalone display mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeoPackGenerator.t: Hook that calls the backend `generateSeoPack` actor method with a video title and topic, managing loading and error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubtitlesGenerator: Hook that generates subtitles by calling the backend `generateSubtitles` method and parses the result into normal and SRT formats, with a fallback SRT generator.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransactionHistory: React Query hook that fetches the caller's coin transaction history from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceoverGenerator: Hook that calls the backend `generateVoiceover` method with script, voice gender, language, speed, and emotion parameters, managing loading and error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useYouTubeScript.ts: Hook that builds a structured YouTube script prompt from form data, calls the backend `generateVideoResponse` actor method, and handles insufficient-coins errors with query cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Inter and Space Grotesk fonts, configures Tailwind CSS, and defines light/dark CSS custom properties for the design system color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with TanStack QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelScreen.tsx: Admin-only panel that allows administrators to manually credit coins to a user account by entering a principal ID and coin amount, with access control and form validation.
frontend/src/pages/ai-video-maker/buildP: Utility function that generates a text-based placeholder video timeline plan from form data and a photo order array, since real MP4 rendering is not supported.
frontend/src/pages/ai-video-maker/musicL: Defines the MusicTrack interface, a list of music categories, and a generator function that produces up to 1500 placeholder music tracks across those categories.
frontend/src/pages/ai-video-maker/MusicL: UI panel for browsing and selecting background music tracks, supporting search and category filtering from a generated library of 1500 tracks.
frontend/src/pages/ai-video-maker/PhotoT: Component for uploading and reordering photos to build a video timeline, with controls to move items up/down or remove them.
frontend/src/pages/AIChatScreen.tsx: AI chat interface page that supports text and image attachments, Groq API key setup/validation, coin balance display, and message history rendering with a scrollable chat area.
frontend/src/pages/AIImageGeneratorScree: AI image generation page where users enter a text prompt to generate images, with coin balance tracking, insufficient-coins alerts, and a download option for generated images.
frontend/src/pages/AIVideoMakerScreen.ts: AI video maker page that lets users configure video settings and generate scripts, storyboards, animation plans, and a photo-based video timeline with music library support.
frontend/src/pages/ColdEmailScreen.tsx: Cold email generator page where users fill in sender/target details and options (tone, goal, length) to produce AI-generated cold emails with optional follow-ups and spam analysis.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardScreen.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying the user's coin balance, principal ID, available AI features (chat, YouTube script, video maker, etc.), and a transaction history panel.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Login page that authenticates users via Internet Identity, handles popup blocker detection, shows login errors, and redirects to the dashboard on success.
Payment cancellation screen that informs the user no charges were made and provides buttons to retry the coin purchase or return to the dashboard.
Payment success screen that parses Stripe session and plan IDs from the URL hash, triggers coin crediting via a mutation, and displays pending/success/error states with the new balance.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileScreen.tsx: Profile management page allowing users to view and update their display name and avatar, copy their principal ID, and log out.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectDefinitionScre: A form-based wizard page where users input project goal, target users, key features, and constraints, then view a structured summary of their project definition.
frontend/src/pages/youtube-script/Script: Tab component for configuring and generating a YouTube video script, with form inputs for topic, language, tone, and length, plus display and copy functionality for the generated script.
frontend/src/pages/youtube-script/SeoPac: Tab component for generating a YouTube SEO pack (titles, description, tags, hashtags, pinned comment, chapters) from a video title and topic, with a copy-all feature.
frontend/src/pages/youtube-script/Subtit: React tab component for generating subtitles from script, voiceover, or pasted text, with options for language and style, and support for copying or downloading the result as an SRT file.
frontend/src/pages/youtube-script/Voiceo: React tab component for generating voiceover scripts with configurable voice gender, language, speed, and emotion, using either the script tab's output or pasted text.
frontend/src/pages/YouTubeScriptScreen.t: Main screen for the YouTube Script Generator feature, providing a tabbed interface (Script, Voiceover, Subtitles, SEO Pack) and passing generated script/voiceover state between tabs.
frontend/src/utils/aiVideoMakerSummary.t: Utility function that builds a human-readable summary string from AI video maker form data, including mode, style, music, and voiceover settings.
frontend/src/utils/coinErrors.ts: Utility functions to detect insufficient-coins errors and return appropriate user-facing error messages.
frontend/src/utils/downloadImageFile.ts: Utility function that triggers a browser download of an image file from a given URL using a temporary anchor element.
frontend/src/utils/downloadTextFile.ts: Utility function that creates a Blob from text content and triggers a browser download with the specified filename.
frontend/src/utils/imageAttachment.ts: Collection of utility functions for handling image attachments in chat, including file-to-Uint8Array conversion, Blob URL management, and image validation for type, size, and dimensions.
frontend/src/utils/parseYouTubeScript.ts: Parses a raw YouTube script string into ordered sections (Hook, Introduction, Main Points, etc.) based on ### headings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color tokens using oklch variables, extended typography, container queries, animation plugins, and custom font families.
project_state.json: Tracks the current state of the Shake AI project, including existing features, pending feature requests, and architectural notes for a Stripe live-mode coin recharge system. Defines three coin packages (100/$1.99, 500/$7.99, 1000/$14.99) and outlines backend/frontend integration requirements.
